successes.title: NEEO - The Thinking Remote
successes.description: NEEO is a smart home automation system. It’s the simplest way to connect and control all the devices in your home.

Pledges.description: GENEROUS SOUL - Thank you for your support! We will include your name on our website and will keep you updated with all the latest news and announcements.
NEEO T-SHIRT - Show your support for NEEO with the special edition NEEO Kickstarter t-shirt. We will also include your name on our website and we will keep you updated with all our latest news.
NEEO BRAIN - Receive one NEEO brain and download our app for free so you can control your home via your smartphone.
SUPER EARLY BIRD COMBO - Be the first to receive one NEEO brain and a NEEO remote for the ultimate NEEO experience at a super low price. Thank you for your early support!
EARLY BIRD NEEO COMBO - You will receive one NEEO brain and the NEEO remote at a very low price. Control your home in style.
BLACK CAT EDITION - You will receive one NEEO brain and the NEEO remote in a beautiful black anodized aluminum finish. Kickstarter only limited edition!
WHITE RABBIT EDITION - You will receive one NEEO brain and the NEEO remote in a beautiful white finish. Kickstarter only limited edition!
RETURN OF THE BLACK CAT – You will receive one NEEO brain and the NEEO remote in a beautiful black anodized aluminum finish. Still: Kickstarter only limited edition!
BLACK CAT: THE DEJA-VU - one brain and one remote, beautifully finished black anodized aluminum.
NEEO COMBO DEAL- You will receive one NEEO brain and the NEEO remote to enable you to take control of your home.
BLACK CAT - THE FINAL STAND. Your last chance to get Black Cats at Kickstarter reward prices. Get 1 black remote and 1 black brain. Only on Kickstarter.
NEEO COMBO - You will receive one NEEO brain and the NEEO remote to enable you to take control of your home.

FAMILY COMBO: NEEO BRAIN & TWO REMOTES  - If you’ve got a busy household then this one is for you. You will receive one NEEO brain and 2 NEEO remotes so the family can control their devices in different rooms at the same time.
TWIN COMBO – You will receive TWO NEEO brains and TWO NEEO remotes. For those going all the way.
BLACK CAT TWIN COMBO - two black brains and two black remotes, because cats need company :-)
NUMBER FREAK #1 - If you like one of a kind, exclusive products then get your hands on the NEEO system (brain and remote) with the serial number “1” engraved on it.
NUMBER FREAK #2 - If you like one of a kind, exclusive products then get your hands on the NEEO system (brain and remote) with the serial number “2” engraved on it.
NUMBER FREAK #3 - If you like one of a kind, exclusive products then get your hands on the NEEO system (brain and remote) with the serial number “3” engraved on it.
NUMBER FREAK #4 - If you like one of a kind, exclusive products then get your hands on the NEEO system (brain and remote) with the serial number “4” engraved on it.
NUMBER FREAK #5 - If you like one of a kind, exclusive products then get your hands on the NEEO system (brain and remote) with the serial number “5” engraved on it.
NUMBER FREAK #6 - If you like one of a kind, exclusive products then get your hands on the NEEO system (brain and remote) with the serial number “6” engraved on it.
NUMBER FREAK #7 - If you like one of a kind, exclusive products then get your hands on the NEEO system (brain and remote) with the serial number “7” engraved on it.
NUMBER FREAK #8 - If you like one of a kind, exclusive products then get your hands on the NEEO system (brain and remote) with the serial number “8” engraved on it.
NUMBER FREAK #9 - If you like one of a kind, exclusive products then get your hands on the NEEO system (brain and remote) with the serial number “9” engraved on it.

COLOR FREAK - You will receive one NEEO brain and the NEEO remote in a color of your choice. Our Industrial Designers will work with you to pick the exact color you love whether you want it to stand out in your home, or compliment the color scheme.

HOME AUTOMATION KIT - Want to make your home super smart? You will receive one NEEO brain and the NEEO remote, as well as 3 Z-Wave multi-sensors for motion light and temperature, 3 Z-Wave dimmers and 3 Z-Wave wall plugs.
PRO COMBO - With this pledge you will get your hands on 10 NEEO brains and 10 NEEO remotes. Introduce your customers to the NEEO revolution.

DESIGN & DINE IN CALIFORNIA - Come and meet the NEEO design team during a 3 day trip to our offices in California. Visit our office, see the sights in the bay area and dine with the team. You will also receive your very own NEEO brain and NEEO remote.  Lots of inspirational design talk & a beautiful surprise guaranteed. Hotel and flight included.

FONDUE IN SWITZERLAND - Come and meet the NEEO engineering team during a 3 day trip to our offices in Switzerland. Visit our office, see the sights of Switzerland and share fondue with the team. You will of course also receive your own NEEO brain and NEEO remote. As a big thank you, you will get an absolutely unique piece of hardware from the team. Hotel and flight included.
